name: ULTIMATE FPS
description:
You are a special agent for the Butt-Kicking Agency (BKA). Top of your class, master at gun combat. Your mission- infiltrate the annual gathering of the notorious Evilbad Family, and take out their leader and Father Figure, Frank Evilbad. You’ve been given the identity of a low-profile member of the family, and you can get into the meeting. But first, you have to get to the Evilbad HQ in the Arctic Circle in time…

~~~

Created for the Unexpected Game Jam 2020. If you are playing in the browser, it is recommended you fullscreen the game for the best experience. If you are playing the x86 version, it is recommended to set the resolution to 1280x720. I hope you enjoy the game!

This was a solo project, with some dialogue from my friends, and art taken from the Unity Asset Store.

CREDITS:

 Font: 1001fonts.com

Sound Effects: freesound.org

Low-Poly Rocks: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-rock-pack-57874
